name: Neon Switch
description:
How to play

Project made in 48 hours for MAD Gamejam 18'    

Neon Switch is a 1v1 multiplayer game where two space ships must smash each other. To win, you must reach 5 points. In order to do so, you'll need to throw boxes and bombs at the enemy,  dodge the ones that are pushed towards you and collect the crystals. For each crystal you collect, you gain one point and for each time you get smashed, you lose one.

You'll need 2 PS3 controllers and ScpToolKit

    Use the left joystick  to move 

    Use the right joystick  to aim

    Use R1 to fire

    Use L1 to switch

    Fire boxes and bombs against your enemy and crystals towards yourself
